name: Dark Dynasty Reader
description: This makes the Dynasty Reader background a dark gray, and the maximum reader image size responsive to your browser window rather than overflowing it.

user.name: ThisIllusions
user.about:
I recommend using Stylus for Chrome/Firefox/Opera, the open source fork of stylish..

more info:
https://robertheaton.com/2018/07/02/stylish-browser-extension-steals-your-internet-history/
https://robertheaton.com/2018/08/16/stylish-is-back-and-you-still-shouldnt-use-it/
